description:
We have many years of experience in creating software solutions for different types of businesses, like telecomms, banks, insurance companies etc.  Over the years, we have helped a number of local and international partners, startups and big enterprises to make their ideas happen. Our approach won their hearts and long-standing trust.
 
The client is at the centre. We simply prepare the solution and do everything to minimise amount of work to be done. We are no masters of everything but some people say we’re one of the best in custom software development for JVM platform in Scala and Java languages.
We are agile, which means that we can adapt to whatever software development practices our clients prefer.
And finally – we deliver results, not promises!
Learn more at www.javeo.eu
